checklist_items.label: Industry Identification
checklist_items.description: User has identified the specific industry or sector

checklist_items.label: Business Type Clarity
checklist_items.description: Type of business or activity is clearly defined

checklist_items.description: Required domain expertise and knowledge areas are identified

checklist_items.label: Market Understanding
checklist_items.description: Basic market dynamics and landscape are understood

checklist_items.label: Competitive Landscape
checklist_items.description: Key competitors and market positioning are considered

checklist_items.label: Regulatory Awareness
